reviews.review_msg:
The assignments he made always had so many mistakes on them.. like he couldn't be bothered to proofread his own assignments. 
 Questions are weird and ambiguous and don't ever trying to show how ambiguous they are because when he thinks he's right he's right.. adn he will explain that in terms of how wrong you are

Works really hard to help his students. He will answer any questions you have and is always available for help. Make sure you speak up and participate in his tutorials. Great effort, he should he a prof instead of a TA because he works hard and is really knowledgeable about the subject.
